casebody.data:
Nancy ROGERS, et al
v.
Claudia METCALF, et al 404P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2017 Zeyland G. McKinney, Jr., Attorney at Law, Robbinsville, for Rogers, Nancy. Claudia Metcalf, for Metcalf, Claudia, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2017 by Defendants for Petition for Rehearing:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2017."
